issue.title: Fix bug in which plasma store can die when client gets multiple objects and object becomes available.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3373](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3373). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This bug was recently introduced in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2650.> The store can die when a client calls "get" on multiple object IDs and then the first object ID becomes available.

Will have a patch momentarily.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3373?focusedCommentId=16633517) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2664
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2664>
